name: Revelry by the Sea
skills: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's ATK is higher than or equal to 2400/3600, increases the DoT DMG dealt by 12%/24%.

name: Arcadia of Woven Dreams
skills: When there are currently more or less than 4 ally targets in battle, each additional/missing ally target increases the wearer and their memosprite's DMG by 9%/12%, up to a maximum of 4/3 stacks.

name: Giant Tree of Rapt Brooding
skills: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's SPD is 135/180 or higher, the wearer and their memosprite's Outgoing Healing increases by 12%/20%.

name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
skills: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

name: The Wondrous BananAmusement Park
skills: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When a target summoned by the wearer is on the field, CRIT DMG additionally increases by 32%.

name: Lushaka, the Sunken Seas
skills: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. If the wearer is not the first character in the team lineup, then increases the ATK of the first character in the team lineup by 12%.

name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
skills: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits an enemy target that has Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
skills: When an ally uses a Follow-up ATK, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 time(s). Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's Follow-up ATKs by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

name: Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm
skills: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When entering battle, if at least one teammate follows the same Path as the wearer, then the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

name: Sigonia, the Unclaimed Desolation
skills: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 4%. When an enemy target gets defeated, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by 4%, stacking up to 10 time(s).

name: Penacony, Land of the Dreams
skills: Increases wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. Increases DMG by 10% for all other allies that are of the same Type as the wearer.

name: Firmament Frontline: Glamoth
skills: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

name: Broken Keel
skills: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

name: Rutilant Arena
skills: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, DMG dealt by Basic ATK and Skill increases by 20%.

name: Sprightly Vonwacq
skills: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
skills: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break Effect increases by an extra 20%.

name: Inert Salsotto
skills: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the DMG dealt by the wearer's Ultimate and Follow-up ATK increases by 15%.

name: Celestial Differentiator
skills: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches 120% or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 60% until the end of their first attack.

name: Belobog of the Architects
skills: Increases the wearer's DEF by 15%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is 50% or higher, the wearer gains an extra 15% DEF.

name: Pan-Cosmic Commercial Enterprise
skills: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.

name: Fleet of the Ageless
skills: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

name: Space Sealing Station
skills: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra 12%.

name: Wavestrider Captain
skills: Increases CRIT DMG by 16%. When the wearer becomes the target of another ally target's ability, gains 1 stack of "Help," stacking up to 2 time(s). If there are 2 stack(s) of "Help" when the wearer uses their Ultimate, consumes all "Help" to increase the wearer's ATK by 48% for 1 turn(s).

name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
skills: Increases SPD by 6%. When the wearer or their memosprite provides healing to ally targets other than themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which lasts for 2 turn(s) and can only trigger once per turn. While the wearer has "Gentle Rain," SPD increases by 6% and all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 15%. This effect cannot stack.

name: Poet of Mourning Collapse
skills: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. Decreases the wearer's SPD by 8%. Before entering battle, if the wearer's SPD is lower than 110/95, increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 20%/32%. This effect applies to the wearer's memosprite at the same time.

name: Hero of Triumphant Song
skills: Increases ATK by 12%. While the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's memosprite attacks, increases the wearer's and memosprite's CRIT DMG by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
skills: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Increases DMG dealt by Skill and Ultimate by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
skills: Increases SPD by 6%. When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
skills: Increases ATK by 12%. Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. After the wearer uses a Follow-up ATK, increases DMG dealt by Ultimate by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
skills: Increases Break Effect by 16%. If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, the Break DMG dealt to the enemy target ignores 10% of their DEF. If the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG dealt to the enemy target additionally ignores 15% of their DEF.

name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
skills: Increases Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, all allies' Break Effect increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
skills: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuffs by 12%. Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
skills: Increases ATK by 12%. For every DoT the enemy target is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of its DEF when dealing DMG to it. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
skills: Increases the DMG dealt by Follow-up ATK by 20%. When the wearer uses a Follow-up ATK, increases the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the Follow-up ATK deals DMG. This effect can stack up to 8 time(s) and lasts for 3 turn(s). This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a Follow-up ATK.

name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
skills: Increases SPD by 6%. When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

name: Longevous Disciple
skills: Increases Max HP by 12%. When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
skills: Increases Imaginary DMG by 10%. When dealing DMG to debuffed enemy targets, the wearer has their CRIT Rate increased by 10%. And when they deal DMG to Imprisoned enemy targets, their CRIT DMG increases by 20%.

name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
skills: Increases Break Effect by 16%. Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. After the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.

name: Eagle of Twilight Line
skills: Increases Wind DMG by 10%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
skills: Increases Lightning DMG by 10%. When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
skills: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
skills: Increases Fire DMG by 10%. Increases DMG by the wearer's Skill by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for the next attack.

name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
skills: Reduces DMG taken by 8%. At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP percentage is equal to or less than 50%, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.

name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
skills: Increases Physical DMG by 10%. After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
skills: Increases Ice DMG by 10%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

name: Knight of Purity Palace
skills: Increases DEF by 15%. Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by 20%.

name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
skills: Increases ATK by 12%. The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and DMG dealt by Basic ATK increases by 10%.

name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
skills: Increases Outgoing Healing by 10%. At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.
